synopsis: Mitsuyoshi encounters a foreign girl who lost her companion while taking photographs. Through many odd series of events they leave and are continuously reunited together.
After touring all the clubs at school, Teresa decides to join the photography club. The intensity begins as the club initiates a photography battle!
As Nyanko Big is reluctant to help open the shop, Teresa and Alec offer a hand in effort to gain additional experience!
After Hajime becomes the lucky winner of the HINA's Book Launch Meet and Greet, the photography club helps him overcome his fear.
Ijuin-kun treats everyone to his cooking for the Tenth Annual Kaoru Ijuin show. Later Teresa enjoys her first bathhouse experience.
An unexpected visitor from Teresa's childhood appears in Japan. He is introduced to the photography club, and later invites Teresa to a party.
When Nyanko-big doesn't return home, the gang splits up and does everything they can to make sure he returns home safely.
The photography club goes on an adventure as they take the rental SLR cameras to capture photos of the stars for the September contest.
Teresa is acting strange in front of everyone as she secretly makes a very serious decision before returning back to Larsenburg.
